field.name: description
field.value:
This line in monorail.build:
<include name="Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport/Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.build" />
should be:
<include name="Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport/Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.build" if="${common.testrunner.enabled}"/>
The following error occurs:
[exec] Starting 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft VisualStudio 8\SDK\v2.0\bin/gacutil.exe ( /f /i Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.dll)' in 'C:\Projects\castle\build\net-2.0\debug' [exec] Microsoft (R) .NET Global Assembly Cache Utility. Version 2.0.50727.42 [exec] Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved. [exec] Failure adding assembly to the cache: Attempt to install an assembly without a strong name
when attempting to build from source using the following command-line:
nant quick build -D:common.testrunner.enabled=false -D:sign=false -D:assembly.allow-partially-trusted-callers=true
